text: Motion

──Ah, Producer,
good morning
Mamimi...!!
...Is something wrong?
That's my line...!

You're showed up 30 minutes late...
Did something happen...?

Eeh?
Nothing in particular. Why?
Then, why didn't you answer your phone?

Ahh... Sorry about that.
I guess my phone was out of battery.

I-I see...
Well, for now, I'm glad nothing happened to you...

── More importantly than that,
Hurry up and get changed and go to the lesson room.
The trainer is waiting on you...!
Ahh, got it.
Motion
Mamimi, good work.

You really worked hard at your lesson today, huh.
It looked like it went pretty well.
Thaaaanks

── and with that,
it's time for your lecture.

Eeh? Just now, 
you said the lesson went pretty well, right?

Yeah, the lesson itself did.
But still, I can't overlook how late you were today.
First off, please explain what caused you to be late.

Aah... I was taking my time getting ready,
and it, like, took longer than I expected, I guess?

... but I didn't really think it would be a problem.
And so I ended up being 30 minutes late, I guess?

I see... Well,
we can't do anything about what's already happend.

From here on out, if you're running late,
you need to try your best to hurry and get here.

And more imporntantly, when you think you might be late,
please promptly contact me and let me know.

......
... I'll keep that in mind.

Oi oi...!
Isn't that where you should reply "Yes!"?
Fufuu...

... Thinking about it,
your job must be pretty tough, Producer.
Having to properly manage idols like this and all...

...... While it is part of my job,
I'm also genuinely concered for you all, too.

Today I was worried that something might have happened,
like you getting hurt or something, Mamimi...!
......worried ...
Motion

──Ah, that's right.
Producer...

Here...
To apologize for today...

...!
Mamimi──
It's the juice I was drinking.

It didn't taste very good,
so I'll give it to you, Producer.

Oi...!
Mamimi, you haven't reflected at all huh...!?

Fufuu...
I wonder, have I...?
